Keywords: Celebrity , Mystical
Real Name: Billy Maximoff
Special Powers
ALL-NEW HALLOWEEN SPOOKTACULAR!: Shape Change. When Billy Maximoff uses it and succeeds, heal him 1 click.
PLEASE STAND BY: STOP.
I DON'T UNDERSTAND, WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?: Perplex. When Billy Maximoff uses it to target a friendly character, until your next turn opposing effects can't be used on that character to reroll, or replace dice in, their attack rolls.

May 25, 2022
Bobcat2022
Being 45 points with the Mystical keyword makes me think of this kid for WotR Dr Strange's Recruiter effect. The ability to Perplex a friendly and give them a supercharged SAFEGUARD: Opposing Probability Control could be clutch, for the right tentpole. But he does pretty much only have the one trick, yeah.
May 4, 2022
Goop
Kind of an expensive perplex with good survivability and that extra protection against opposing prob. Not bad, not great, decent for his cost.
